name: In re Claim of Michael MILBOURNE, etc. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Crime Victim's Compensation Board. Appeal of Michael MILBOURNE

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: In re Claim of Michael MILBOURNE, etc. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Crime Victim’s Compensation Board. Appeal of Michael MILBOURNE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: David B. Sherman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gregory R. Neuhauser, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
490 A.2d 437
In re Claim of Michael MILBOURNE, etc. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Pennsylvania Crime Victim’s Compensation Board. Appeal of Michael MILBOURNE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 16, 1985.
Decided April 23, 1985.
David B. Sherman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gregory R. Neuhauser, Deputy Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
